messages.body:
Hi Done,¬†
Have you started used Claude Code yet? we are trying to offer quick 30min to help folks who's interested in Claude Code setup and use Claude Code for GTM use-case. (it helps us to learn better how to help while introducing MCP into pic too)

We will use this repo to start:¬†https://github.com/datagendev/context-foundation/tree/main¬†

let me know if you are interested.

Hey Yu,

I can't open the repo, but I am interested yeah.
Cool! So weird, just double checked it‚Äôs an open/public repo. Do you see 404 or anything else?
Also may I know where are you on Claude code? Have you tried to install and used before?
Installed it yeah, used it a bit more this week.
It's a slow progress, have to test things out in my free time
And that is not a lot! Haha

Nice! We have talked to many who have never used and we even need to help them to installed‚Ä¶ 
Are there anything you want to achieve with Claude code? Or mainly explorative

Speed things up work wise.

Keep track of progress in personal life.

I want to figure out what it means to live in an Ai first lifestyle or whatever that might mean.

Try and see if and to what extent can AI tech help my life more fun and efficient.
btw. saw this earlier. feel like align with your intent of Claude Code.¬†https://www.alephic.com/writing/the-magic-of-claude-code
